Title: American Relief Agency - Report on American relief work. 15
Notes: American relief supports an increase in food production. The image on the left show a technician at work in a laboratory preparing vaccines to protect chickens from contagious diseases. The Relief Agency supports the breeding of chickens at home, below.Nr. 15 of the poster set on the Economic Aid Agreement between the United States of America and the Republic of China (3 July 1948).
